column4: Ubuntu 9.04 isnt in beta stage is it? Because for some reason It seems to be well Slow. I dont know what it is but every couple of minutes when it feels like it it becomes slow and wont respond fast
2GB ram and a 1.73 ghz processor are enough to run ubuntu 9.04 correct?
I am using jaunty with 800mhz and 512 MB.
